Title: Alik Sukh - A tale of fleeting happiness
Writer: Suchitra Bhattacharya (story), Shibprasad Mukhopadhyay (screen play and dialogue), Nandita Roy (screen play and dialogue)
Actors: Shakuntala Barua, Biswanath Basu, Sudipa Basu, Anindya Chatterjee
Plot: The story is of Doctor Kingshuk Guha a gynaecologist who is out negotiating the purchase of a luxury apartment for himself and his wife Rammani and is unable to attend to an emergency ...
